archimate:Requirement.name: TCO needs to be looked upon both from Tietoevry Tech Services delivery perspective and from the perspective of the customer who is consuming a Tietoevry service. The environmental cost: sustainability in production, delivery and consumption should be accounted for when concluding the TCO such as; material efficiency (waste and recycling) and energy efficiency and source.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This requirement is derived directly from the Tech Services Architecture Principles.
